body_html:
It was marked as closed because it was working as intended -- there are two versions of TensorFlow, one that requires cuda libraries, and the one that doesn't, so it's expected that the former will crash without cuda libraries present.

I agree see that it adds to management pain, if someone has an idea of a solution (ie, how to restructure tensorflow to remove static linking requirement) it could make to make a feature request with an overview of how to solve this.
